language.entry: The Revenant is nothing without his reaver, his shield, and his heavy armor. All of his gear is imbued with powerful dark magic - some even say it's possessed. His unbreakable shield bleeds his enemies, and his bloodthirsty reaver breaks them.
Members of the blood order don't travel together.
My presence is intimidating; religious classes will not accompany me.
I don't know what's worse, an eldritch deity or an old shieldbearer.
A man of stone is worthless to me.
Members of the blood order don't travel together.
I refuse to travel with a sanguine knight.
Blood knights despise me quite a bit.

Dark and corrupted, the Revenant is a sanguine knight with unmatched durability. As a master of the dark arts, he saps the blood of his adversaries at a cost, weakens them and empowers himself as his enemies bleed. He strives to preserve order through chaos and destruction.
Revenant is a blood knight from the ancient age. Despised by many for a very good reason, he weakens his group to strengthen himself however, we need all the help we can get in these dire times.
I'm the reason we made it this far, I need to see it through!
This bandage should be of use to you.
You are lucky i'm on your side... for now.
Follow my lead and we will prevail!
You should fear me more than this place.
Let the darkness flow through you! Embrace it!
The end is only the beginning.
Through chaos, I will have order.
Gwuon' hwash, hwa'tha. Darkness, restore me!
Aarm' dwahm, xan'thon. Give me strength!.
Urn'dom gahl, mahr. My wounds close!.
Your lives matter not to me!
We only made it this far because of me!
Why am I travelling with these fools?
The power of the dark arts!
So this is what fear feels like...
I know what you are up to.
Come out! I know you are there!
You all mean nothing to me!
All of this belongs to me!
I am the reason we still live!
You will give me your blood!
There is no reason to continue.
I will not speak to you.
We should just let it go.
To perish now or later, it makes no difference.
You do not tell me what to do!
I'm unable to take action right now.
Why should I even care about this?
I will attack when I want to!
I will do what I need to!
Why should I listen to you?
I will win this on my own.
I do what I want to do.
I will do what I need to do.
I do not want to perish in this dungeon.
There is something in the dark.
Be on your guard - we are being watched.
I never wanted to travel with any of you.
I wish you were more competent.
I'm the leader of this expedition.
If we survive, I will take all the glory!
We should just cook ourselves in this fire.
I just don't see us surviving this.
Maybe I should just go back...
I command YOU, not the other way around!
Make me feel it! Make me feel alive again!
I know what you are up to.
Stop telling me what to do!
No, they are waiting to ambush us!
Dying is just a part of living.
I'm sick and tired of you.
Why are you in my way?
No! Why did you attack so soon?
You wanted to miss, didn't you?
Is it so hard to dodge?
Just move out of the way.
This is not a good idea.
Where are all the enemies hiding?
We cannot go the other way.
That is not ideal - I need to suffer.
I do not listen to your commands.
Get out of my head, reaver.
I shouldn't do that - they are anticipating it.
No, that's just what they want.
That is unwise - my wounds may not heal.
Suffering is the way - healing is not.
There is no reason to heal me.
I make the decisions around here.
That will not help our cause.
That is not a wise idea.
Fear is such an interesting emotion.
Something is lurking in the shadows.
Pain is a way of life.
I'm the leader of this group.
This fear is getting to me.
I don't trust any of you.
Such a sad example of life.
We should just leave this place.
Remember that you are alive only because I allow it.
I am the midnight of your soul.
There's something wrong with this food...
Did you put something in this food?
You're fighting for a lost cause.
I will eat whenever I feel like it.

The Revenant is nothing without his reaver, his shield, and his heavy armor. All of his gear is imbued with powerful dark magic - some even say it's possessed. His unbreakable shield bleeds his enemies, and his bloodthirsty reaver breaks them.
Members of the blood order don't travel together.
My presence is intimidating; religious classes will not accompany me.
I don't know what's worse, an eldritch deity or an old shieldbearer.
A man of stone is worthless to me.
Members of the blood order don't travel together.
I refuse to travel with a sanguine knight.
Blood knights despise me quite a bit.

Revenant is a blood knight from the ancient age. Despised by many for a very good reason, he weakens his group to strengthen himself however, we need all the help we can get in these dire times.

I do what I want to do.
I will do what I need to do.

I never wanted to travel with any of you.
I wish you were more competent.

We should just cook ourselves in this fire.

I know what you are up to.
Stop telling me what to do!
No, they are waiting to ambush us!

I'm sick and tired of you.
Why are you in my way?

You wanted to miss, didn't you?
Is it so hard to dodge?
Just move out of the way.
This is not a good idea.
Where are all the enemies hiding?
We cannot go the other way.
That is not ideal - I need to suffer.
I do not listen to your commands.
Get out of my head, reaver.
I shouldn't do that - they are anticipating it.
No, that's just what they want.
That is unwise - my wounds may not heal.
Suffering is the way - healing is not.
There is no reason to heal me.

That will not help our cause.
That is not a wise idea.
Fear is such an interesting emotion.

Such a sad example of life.
We should just leave this place.
Remember that you are alive only because I allow it.
I am the midnight of your soul.
There's something wrong with this food...
Did you put something in this food?
You're fighting for a lost cause.
I will eat whenever I feel like it.
혈귀는 중갑과 방패, 약탈검으로 무장했습니다. 그의 장비들은 흑마술에 물들었습니다. 어쩌면 홀려버린 것일지도 모릅니다. 그의 든든한 방패는 피를 부를 것이며, 피에 목마른 약탈검이 적들을 마무리할 것입니다.
나는 두려운 존재이지. 신을 모시는 자들과는 함께할 수 없네.
이계의 신과 늙은 방패병이라. 어느 쪽도 마음에 들지 않네만.
혈기사들은 나를 좋아하지 않는 것 같더군.
혈귀는 어둡고 타락한 피의 기사이지만, 놀랍도록 튼튼합니다. 수준급의 흑마술 실력으로 적들을 약화시키고, 피를 뽑아내어 자신을 강화합니다. 그는 혼돈과 파괴를 통해 질서를 유지하기 위해서 싸웁니다.
혈귀는 고대의 혈기사입니다. 힘을 얻기 위해 동료들을 약화시키는 경멸스러운 존재이지만 이런 힘든 시기에는 그들의 힘을 빌려야만 합니다.
내 덕에 여기까지 올 수 있었던 걸세! 난 끝을 봐야겠네!
내가 자네 편인걸 다행으로 알게나... 지금으로서는.
이곳보다 나를 더 두려워해야 할 걸세.
Gwuon' hwash, hwa'tha. 어둠이여, 내게 힘을!
자네 목숨이 붙어있는 건 내 덕이네!
정체를 밝히게! 숨어있는 것 다 안다네!
지금 죽으나 더 고통받다가 죽으나 똑같은 것 아니겠나.
날 괴롭혀라! 다시 살아있는 그 느낌을!
일부러 빗나가게 한 걸 모를 줄 알았나?
저들이 바라는 대로 해줄 순 없네.
그런 것 없이도 살 수 있네.

The Revenant is nothing without his reaver, his shield, and his heavy armor. All of his gear is imbued with powerful dark magic - some even say it's possessed. His unbreakable shield bleeds his enemies, and his bloodthirsty reaver breaks them.
Members of the blood order don't travel together.
My presence is intimidating; religious classes will not accompany me.
I don't know what's worse, an eldritch deity or an old shieldbearer.
A man of stone is worthless to me.
Members of the blood order don't travel together.
I refuse to travel with a sanguine knight.
Blood knights despise me quite a bit.

Dark and corrupted, the Revenant is a sanguine knight with unmatched durability. As a master of the dark arts, he saps the blood of his adversaries at a cost, weakens them and empowers himself as his enemies bleed. He strives to preserve order through chaos and destruction.
Revenant is a blood knight from the ancient age. Despised by many for a very good reason, he weakens his group to strengthen himself however, we need all the help we can get in these dire times.
I'm the reason we made it this far, I need to see it through!
This bandage should be of use to you.
You are lucky i'm on your side... for now.
Follow my lead and we will prevail!
You should fear me more than this place.
Let the darkness flow through you! Embrace it!
The end is only the beginning.
Through chaos, I will have order.
Gwuon' hwash, hwa'tha. Darkness, restore me!
Aarm' dwahm, xan'thon. Give me strength!.
Urn'dom gahl, mahr. My wounds close!.
Your lives matter not to me!
We only made it this far because of me!
Why am I travelling with these fools?
The power of the dark arts!
So this is what fear feels like...
I know what you are up to.
Come out! I know you are there!
You all mean nothing to me!
All of this belongs to me!
I am the reason we still live!
You will give me your blood!
There is no reason to continue.
I will not speak to you.
We should just let it go.
To perish now or later, it makes no difference.
You do not tell me what to do!
I'm unable to take action right now.
Why should I even care about this?
I will attack when I want to!
I will do what I need to!
Why should I listen to you?
I will win this on my own.
I do what I want to do.
I will do what I need to do.
I do not want to perish in this dungeon.
There is something in the dark.
Be on your guard - we are being watched.
I never wanted to travel with any of you.
I wish you were more competent.
I'm the leader of this expedition.
If we survive, I will take all the glory!
We should just cook ourselves in this fire.
I just don't see us surviving this.
Maybe I should just go back...
I command YOU, not the other way around!
Make me feel it! Make me feel alive again!
I know what you are up to.
Stop telling me what to do!
No, they are waiting to ambush us!
Dying is just a part of living.
I'm sick and tired of you.
Why are you in my way?
No! Why did you attack so soon?
You wanted to miss, didn't you?
Is it so hard to dodge?
Just move out of the way.
This is not a good idea.
Where are all the enemies hiding?
We cannot go the other way.
That is not ideal - I need to suffer.
I do not listen to your commands.
Get out of my head, reaver.
I shouldn't do that - they are anticipating it.
No, that's just what they want.
That is unwise - my wounds may not heal.
Suffering is the way - healing is not.
There is no reason to heal me.
I make the decisions around here.
That will not help our cause.
That is not a wise idea.
Fear is such an interesting emotion.
Something is lurking in the shadows.
Pain is a way of life.
I'm the leader of this group.
This fear is getting to me.
I don't trust any of you.
Such a sad example of life.
We should just leave this place.
Remember that you are alive only because I allow it.
I am the midnight of your soul.
There's something wrong with this food...
Did you put something in this food?
You're fighting for a lost cause.
I will eat whenever I feel like it.

The Revenant is nothing without his reaver, his shield, and his heavy armor. All of his gear is imbued with powerful dark magic - some even say it's possessed. His unbreakable shield bleeds his enemies, and his bloodthirsty reaver breaks them.

You're fighting for a lost cause.
I will eat whenever I feel like it.

Le Revenant n'est rien sans sa hache, son bouclier et son armure lourde. Tout son équipement est imbu d'une puissante magie noire - certains disent même qu'il est possédé. Tandis que son bouclier indestructible fait saigner ses ennemis, sa double hache assoiffée de sang les brise.
Les membres de l'Ordre du sang ne voyagent pas ensemble.
Ma présence intimide les personnes religieuses; elles ne m'accompagneront pas.
Lequel des deux est le plus insupportable : une divinité aberrante ou un vieux porte-bouclier ?
Une statue ambulante ne vaut rien à mes yeux.
Les membres de l'Ordre du sang ne voyagent pas ensemble.
Je refuse de voyager avec des chevaliers sanguinaires.
Je ne fais pas confiance aux chevaliers de leur Ordre.
Les chevaliers de sang me méprisent, et pas qu'un peu.

Sombre et corrompu, le Revenant est un chevalier sanguinaire avec une résistance inégalée. En tant que maître des art noirs, il peut, à un certain prix, vider ses ennemis de leur sang, les affaiblir et se renforcer lui-même tandis qu'ils continuent de saigner. De manière paradoxale, il s'efforce de préserver l'ordre au travers du chaos et de la destruction.

Le Revenant est un chevalier de sang de l'Âge antique. Son utilisation des pouvoirs de son Ordre le rend méprisé de tous : Il a tendance à se renforcer au prix du sang de ses compagnons, même si les avantages qu'il obtient ne sont pas négligeables...
Je suis la raison pour laquelle nous sommes allés aussi loin. Je dois en finir !
Rassure-toi, je suis de ton côté… pour le moment.
Tu as moins à craindre de cet endroit que de moi.
Laisse les Ténèbres s'écouler à travers ton corps ! Accepte leur étreinte !
Mmm... Mon essence gagne en puissance !
Cet endroit me rappelle... ma demeure.
Gwuon' hwash, hwa'tha. Que les Ténèbres me rétablissent !
Aarm' dwahm, xan'thon. Donnez-moi la force !
Urn'dom gahl, mahr. Mes plaies se ferment!
Je n'ai que faire de vos vies !
Nous ne sommes arrivés jusqu'ici que grâce à moi !
Pourquoi suis-je en train de voyager avec ces imbéciles ?
Je ne céderai pas à la peur !
Montrez-vous ! Je sais que vous êtes là !
Vous ne valez rien à mes yeux !
Pourquoi vous acharner à essayer malgré votre incompétence ?
Vous êtes sans espoir ! Tous autant que vous êtes
Je suis ce pourquoi nous vivons encore!
Il n'y a pas de raison pour continuer.
Je ne peux pas me contrôler.
Plus de coups… Plus de douleur...
Je ne peux pas tenir en place.
J'ai besoin d'un peu de temps.
Ce combat n'a pas de sens...
Pourquoi est-ce que je continue d'essayer ?
Mourir maintenant ou demain, quelle importance ?
Je les prends tous à la fois !
Je ne peux pas me tenir ici.
Vous n'avez pas à me dire ce que j'ai à faire !
Il me faut plus de temps.
Je ne peux pas agir de suite.
Avons-nous une réelle raison de combattre ?
Je ne vous fais pas confiance!
Je ferai ce que j'ai besoin de faire!
J'ai besoin de sentir la douleur !
Non, je ne le ferais pas...
Je fais ce que je veux faire.
Je ferais ce qu'il faut faire.
Ces chuchotements continuent de me hanter.
Je ne tiens pas à périr en ces lieux.
Quelque chose se cache dans l'ombre.
Je sens le mal autour de nous...
Soyez sur vos gardes – on nous observe.
Il n'y a pas de mot pour exprimer le bonheur qu'apporte cette souffrance.
Rien de tel que l'agonie pour se sentir vivant.
Je n'ai jamais voulu partir avec vous.
Si seulement vous étiez plus compétents.
Vous auriez tous péri sans moi.
C'est moi, le meneur de cette expédition.
Si nous survivons, toute la gloire devra me revenir !
Autant se brûler ici, dans ce feu de camp...
Je ne vois pas comment nous pourrions survivre...
Faites-moi saigner… si vous en êtes capables.
Faites-moi sentir que je vis encore !
Peut-être est-ce ce qui peut en finir avec moi.
Je sais ce que tu t'apprêtes à faire.
Tu n'es qu'un inutile sac à viande.
Je ne peux pas allez plus loin...
Je ne peux plus me contrôler.
Ne me dis plus ce que j'ai à faire !
Nous ne pouvons pas nous échapper.
Non, ils nous attendent en embuscade !
Nous n'échapperons pas à notre fin...
Mourir n'est qu'une étape de la vie...
J'aime beaucoup les blessures qui me sont infligées ici.
Il suffit juste de tous les tuer !
Qu'ai-je raté pour recevoir cette attaque ?
Cela suffit ! J'en ai assez de toi !
Pourquoi ai-je eu peur alors qu'il était à ma portée ?
Je suis certain que cela était prévu.
Ce n'est pas ce que je voulais...
Je n'ai même pas cherché à esquiver.
Pourquoi t'es-tu mis en travers de mon chemin ?
Je parie qu'il n'a rien senti...
Non ! Pourquoi avoir attaqué si tôt ?
Essaye de faire mieux la prochaine fois.
Tu voulais rater cette attaque, n'est-ce pas ?
Je ne peux pas voir ça...
Cela fait partie de leurs plans.
J'aurais tellement aimé être à ta place.
Comment cela a t-il pu rater ?
Ce n'est pas une bonne idée.
Non, je veux pouvoir voir ceux qui me feront saigner.
Il faut combattre,pas se déplacer sans fin.
Pourquoi ? Tu m'as l'air très bien là où tu es.
Je ne vous fais pas confiance.
Je préfère souffrir, ceci ne m'y aidera pas.
Laissez-moi seul, vous et votre aide.
Je ne toucherais pas à ça.
Hors de ma tête, Saccageur ! Ne m'y force pas
Je ne devrais pas faire cela, ils l'ont prévu...
Non, c'est justement ce qu'ils veulent.
Mes blessures pourraient ne pas guérir si tu fais ça.
Il faut souffrir – pas se soigner.
Non merci, je préfère garder ces blessures.
Il ne sert à rien de me soigner....
Qui a dit que je voulais être soigné ?
Je décide de si c'est nécessaire ou non.
Non, le juste chemin est celui de la souffrance.
La douleur est tout ce dont j'ai besoin.
Ce n'est pas une bonne idée.
Je veux en finir au plus vite.
Nous ne devrions pas être ici.
C'est mauvais... Rien va pas bien.
Non je vois quelque chose dans les ombres et je ne veux pas qu'elle s'approche
Un instant. Je sens quelque chose.
La douleur est un mode de vie.
Il faut souffrir, cela est essentiel.
Si seulement je pouvais me battre, là, maintenant...
Pas la peine d'essayer de me convaincre...
Je dirige ce groupe, il me faut plus.
Nous somme encerclé par les ombres.
Ne m'approchez moi, Il veut me contrôler.
Je ne suis pas sur que cela me profite.
Non merci, je dois d'abord calmer ma peur.
Je me méfie de toi, je préfère éviter.
Nous devrions aller combattre d'autres de ces créatures.
Je ne veux pas de ça !
Rappelle-toi que tu n'es en vie que parce que je le permet...
Je suis le cauchemar de ton âme.
Cette nourriture a quelque chose qui ne va pas...
Avez-vous mis quelque chose dans cette nourriture ?
Je n'ai aucun intérêt à manger cette nourriture.
Vous vous battez pour une cause perdue...
Je mangerai quand je le voudrais.

El Retornado no es nada sin su segadora, su escudo y su armadura pesada. Todo su equipamiento está imbuido de poderosa magia negra, algunos incluso creen que está poseído. Su inquebrantable escudo hace sangrar a sus enemigos y su oscura segadora los aniquila.
Los miembros de la orden de la sangre no viajan juntos.
Mi presencia intimida a los débiles, los menos tolerantes no me acompañarán.
No se que es peor, una deidad pagana o un escudero anciano.
Un hombre de piedra no tiene valor para mí.
Los miembros de la orden de la sangre no viajan juntos.
Me niego a viajar con otros caballeros sangreintos.
No confío en otros caballeros de sangre.
Los caballeros de sangre me desprecian un poco.

Oscuro y corrompido, el Retornado es un caballero sanguinario con una durabilidad inigualable. Como maestro de las artes oscuras, maldice la sangre de sus adversarios a costa de la suya propia, debilitándolos y aumentando su poder mientras sus enemigos sangran. Su meta es preservar el orden a través del caos y la destrucción.

Retornado es un caballero de la sangre de la antigüedad. Despreciado por muchos por una muy buena razón, debilita a su grupo para fortalecerse, sin embargo, necesitamos toda la ayuda que podamos obtener en estos tiempos difíciles.
I'm the reason we made it this far, I need to see it through!
Este vendaje debería serte de utilidad.
Tenéis suerte de tenerme de vuestro lado, por ahora.
Deberíais temerme más a mí que a este lugar.
¡Deja que la oscuridad fluya a través de ti, abrázala!
Este lugar... se parece a mi hogar.
La muerte es solo el principio.
A través del caos encontraré el orden.
¡Urn'dom gahl, mahr, mis heridas se cierran!.
¡Hemos llegado tan lejos gracias a mí!
Así que esto es sentir miedo.
¡Yo soy la razón por la que seguimos vivos!
Morir ahora o morir después, no existe diferencia.
¡Tu no me dices lo que debo hacer!
Hare lo que debe ser echo.
no quiero morir en esta mazmorra.
Siento el mal a mi alrededor.
Soy el líder de esta expedición.
¡Si sobrevivimos, me llevaré todo la gloria!
Deberíamos cocinarnos a nosotros mismos en este fuego.
No veo como vamos a sobrevivir a esto.
¡Yo doy las ordenes y tu las obedeces!
¡No, está empezando a ganar el control!
No podemos escapar de nuestro destino.
La muerte solo es parte de la vida.
¿Que es lo que me estoy perdiendo?
Creo que eso forma parte del plan.
La próxima vez, inténtalo con más ganas.
La próxima vez, dejad que yo ataque.
Ese movimiento no sirve de nada.
No podemos ir hacia otro lado.
Me niego a confiar en ti.
Eso no es lo correcto, debo sufrir.
No debería hacer eso, lo están esperando.
No, eso es lo que quieren.
Eso es imprudente, mis heridas puede que no curen.
Necesito dolor, no quiero que mis heridas sanen.
El sufrimiento es el camino, no la curación.
La curación no me servirá de nada.
No. El dolor es el camino.
El miedo es una emoción interesante.
El dolor es el camino de la vida.
Soy el líder de este grupo.
No confío en ninguno de vosotros.
Que forma de vivir tan patética.
Recordad que estáis vivos por lo permito.
Soy la medianoche de tu alma.
¿Le habéis puesto algo a esta comida?
Выживший полагается на свои оружие, щит и тяжелые доспехи. Вся его экипировка пропитана темной магией - поговаривают, что она даже одержима. Его шит вызывает кровь, его оружие обнажает мясо.
Мое присутствие угнетает. Верующие не пойдут со мной.
Не знаю, что хуже: старое божество или старая щитоломка.
Я отказываюсь путешествовать с кровавым рыцарем.

Темный и испорченный, Выживший кровавый рыцарь славится своим долголетием. Будучи адептом темных искусств, он иссушает кровь своих жертв, ослабляя их и наделяя себя силой. Он стремится сохранить порядок через хаос и разрушения.
Выживший есть кровавый рыцарь с незапамятных времен. Его сторонятся не без причин, он ослабляет других, чтобы усилить себя. Однако в эти тяжелые времена потребуется всякая помощь.
Я причина, по которой мы это сделали, мне нужно это увидеть!
Я на твоей стороне... пока что.
Положись на меня, и мы справимся!
Гвон' хаш, ха'фа. Тьма, исцели меня!
Аарм' двахм, зан'зон. Дай мне сил!
Только благодаря мне мы дошли сюда!
Почему я путешествую с этими глупцами?
Путь наш ведет к трагичному концу.
Лишь благодаря мне вы стоите на ногах!
Я не могу просто стоять здесь.
Пасть сейчас или потом, нет разницы.
Я буду сражаться на своих условиях.
Я не желал путешествовать с вами.
Лучше нам самим прыгнуть в этот костер.
Даже не представляю, как мы выживем.
Я твой ГРАФ, и никак иначе!
Давай! Дай мне ощутить вкус жизни!
Нападайте на меня. Таков мой указ.
Нет, они ждут нас в засаде!
Мы не можем избежать нашей кончины.
Нет! Почему ты атаковал так скоро?
Мы не можем идти в другую сторону.
Так не пойдет, я должен страдать.
Это неразумно - мои раны могут не заживать.
Не лечение, страдания ведут к мудрости.
Я никому из вас не доверяю

Upiór byłby nikim bez swojego berła, tarczy i ciężkiej zbroi. Całe to wyposażenie przesiąknięte jest najpotężniejszą czarną magią - niektórzy mówią że może być nawet przeklęte. Jego niezłomna tarcza tnie i kaleczy wszelkich wrogów, a berło miażdży ich ostatecznie.
Ludzie wiary nie potrafią znieść mojej upiornej bytności.
Nie wiem co gorsze, obmierzły demon z otchłani, czy jego stary sługus.
Człowiek z kamienia jest dla mnie bezwartościowy.
Nie przystanę na współpracę z rycerzem krwi.
Rycerzom krwawego bractwa nie można ufać.
Krwawi rycerze niezbyt za mną przepadają.

Posępny i sparszywiały, Upiór to krwawy wojownik o niezrównanej mocy. Mistrz sztuk zakazanych, czerpiąc krew swoich przeciwników wyniszcza ich jednoczesnie samemu rosnąc w siłę. Poprzez chaos i zniszczenie zaprowadza on porządek na polu bitwy.

Revenant to rycerz krwi od starożytności. Zemszczony przez wielu z bardzo dobrego powodu, osłabia swoją grupę, aby wzmocnić się jednak, potrzebujemy całej pomocy, jaką możemy dostać w tych strasznych czasach.
To dzięki mnie zaszliśmy tak daleko, muszę doprowadzić to do końca!
Te bandaże z pewnością ci się przydadzą.
Masz szczęście, że jestem po twojej stronie ... Przynajmniej na razie.
Rób to co każę, a zwyciężymy!
To nie to miejsce lecz ja powinienem być twym głównym zmartwieniem.
Pozwól aby mrok cię wypełnił. Słuchaj go!
Czuję się tutaj... jak w domu.
Gwuon' hwash, hwa'tha. Ciemności, przywróć mnie!
Aarm' dwahm, xan'thon. Daj mi siłę!.
Urn'dom gahl, mahr. Moje rany się zamykają!.
Wasze życia nie mają dla mnie znaczenia!
Dotarliśmy aż tutaj tylko dzięki mnie!
Dlaczego ja podróżuję z tymi durniami?
Moja obrona jest nie do przebicia!
Moja potęga mrozi krew w żyłach!
To nie może dobrze się skończyć.
Wszyscy znaczycie dla mnie tyle co nic!
Po co się w ogóle wysilać?
Te szepty są nie do zniesienia...
Po co nam cierpieć, niech to się już skończy.
Przepaść teraz czy później, co za różnica.
Nie będziesz mi mówił co mam robić!
Dlaczego miałbym w ogóle się tym przejmować?
Nie chcę umierać w tym lochu.
Nigdy nie chciałem podróżować z żadnym z was.
Jeżeli przeżyjemy to cała chwała przypadnie mnie!
Powinniśmy po prostu spalić się w tym ogniu.
To JA rozkazuję TOBIE, nie na odwrót!
Spraw żebym to czuł! Spraw bym z nowu czuł się żywy
Jak ja cie pierdolne to cie krew zaleje!
Przestań mi mówić co mam robić!
Nie możemy uciec przed naszą zgubą.
Śmierć to po prostu część życia.
Idzie nam jak krew z nosa.
Nie tak powinno być, potrzebuję cierpieć.
To nie rozsądne, moje rany się nie zagoją.
Cierpienie jest mi potrzebne, nie leczenie.
Moja moje rany i tak nie krzepną.
Powinniśmy po prostu z tąd odejść.
Pamiętajcie o tym, że żyjecie tylko dlatego ,że na to pozwalam
Coś jest nie tak z tym jedzeniem...
Czy nie dodaliście czegoś do mojego jedzenia?
Będę jadł kiedy mi sie podoba.

The Revenant is nothing without his reaver, his shield, and his heavy armor. All of his gear is imbued with powerful dark magic - some even say it's possessed. His unbreakable shield bleeds his enemies, and his bloodthirsty reaver breaks them.
Members of the blood order don't travel together.
My presence is intimidating; religious classes will not accompany me.
I don't know what's worse, an eldritch deity or an old shieldbearer.
A man of stone is worthless to me.
Members of the blood order don't travel together.
I refuse to travel with a sanguine knight.
Blood knights despise me quite a bit.

Dark and corrupted, the Revenant is a sanguine knight with unmatched durability. As a master of the dark arts, he saps the blood of his adversaries at a cost, weakens them and empowers himself as his enemies bleed. He strives to preserve order through chaos and destruction.
Revenant is a blood knight from the ancient age. Despised by many for a very good reason, he weakens his group to strengthen himself however, we need all the help we can get in these dire times.
I'm the reason we made it this far, I need to see it through!
This bandage should be of use to you.
You are lucky i'm on your side... for now.
Follow my lead and we will prevail!
You should fear me more than this place.
Let the darkness flow through you! Embrace it!
The end is only the beginning.
Through chaos, I will have order.
Gwuon' hwash, hwa'tha. Darkness, restore me!
Aarm' dwahm, xan'thon. Give me strength!.
Urn'dom gahl, mahr. My wounds close!.
Your lives matter not to me!
We only made it this far because of me!
Why am I travelling with these fools?
The power of the dark arts!
So this is what fear feels like...
I know what you are up to.
Come out! I know you are there!
You all mean nothing to me!
All of this belongs to me!
I am the reason we still live!
You will give me your blood!
There is no reason to continue.
I will not speak to you.
We should just let it go.
To perish now or later, it makes no difference.
You do not tell me what to do!
I'm unable to take action right now.
Why should I even care about this?
I will attack when I want to!
I will do what I need to!
Why should I listen to you?
I will win this on my own.
I do what I want to do.
I will do what I need to do.
I do not want to perish in this dungeon.
There is something in the dark.
Be on your guard - we are being watched.
I never wanted to travel with any of you.
I wish you were more competent.
I'm the leader of this expedition.
If we survive, I will take all the glory!
We should just cook ourselves in this fire.
I just don't see us surviving this.
Maybe I should just go back...
I command YOU, not the other way around!
Make me feel it! Make me feel alive again!
I know what you are up to.
Stop telling me what to do!
No, they are waiting to ambush us!
Dying is just a part of living.
I'm sick and tired of you.
Why are you in my way?
No! Why did you attack so soon?
You wanted to miss, didn't you?
Is it so hard to dodge?
Just move out of the way.
This is not a good idea.
Where are all the enemies hiding?
We cannot go the other way.
That is not ideal - I need to suffer.
I do not listen to your commands.
Get out of my head, reaver.
I shouldn't do that - they are anticipating it.
No, that's just what they want.
That is unwise - my wounds may not heal.
Suffering is the way - healing is not.
There is no reason to heal me.
I make the decisions around here.
That will not help our cause.
That is not a wise idea.
Fear is such an interesting emotion.
Something is lurking in the shadows.
Pain is a way of life.
I'm the leader of this group.
This fear is getting to me.
I don't trust any of you.
Such a sad example of life.
We should just leave this place.
Remember that you are alive only because I allow it.
I am the midnight of your soul.
There's something wrong with this food...
Did you put something in this food?
You're fighting for a lost cause.
I will eat whenever I feel like it.

O Regressado não é nada sem seu devastador, seu escudo, e sua armadura pesada. Todo o seu equipamento está imbuído de poderosa magia negra - alguns até dizem que ela é possuída. Seu escudo inquebrável sangra seus inimigos, e seu devastador sanguinário os quebra.
Membros da ordem sangrenta não viajam juntos.
Minha presença é intimidadora; classes religiosas não irão me acompanhar.
Eu não sei o que é pior, uma entidade esquecida ou um velho portador de escudo.
Um homem de pedra é inutil pra mim.
Membros da ordem sangrenta não viajam juntos.
Eu recuso viajar com cavaleiros sanguíneos.
Eu não confio em cavaleiros carmesim.
Cavaleiros do sangue me odeiam consideravelmente.

Escuro e amaldiçoado, o Regressado é um cavaleiro sanguíneo com durabilidade inigualável. Como mestre das artes negras, Ele jorra o sangue de seus adversários por um preço, enfraquece e empodera a si mesmo enquanto seus inimigos sangram. Ele luta para preservar a ordem através de caos e destruição.

O Regressado é um cavaleiro de sangue da idade antiga. Desprezado por muitos por uma razão muito boa, ele enfraquece seu grupo para se fortalecer, no entanto, precisamos de toda a ajuda que podemos obter nestes tempos difíceis.
Eu sou a razão de temos ido tão longe, eu preciso terminar isso!
Este curativo deve ser de uso para você.
Você tem sorte de eu estar do seu lado... por enquanto.
Siga minha liderança e iremos prevalescer!
Você deveria sentir mais medo de mim do que desse lugar.
Deixe a escuridão fluir sobre você! Abrace-a!
Esse lugar me faz sentir... em casa.
Esse final é só o começo.
Através do caos, eu terei a ordem.
Gwuon' hwash, hwa'tha. Escuridão, me restore!
Aarm' dwahm, xan'thon. Me dê força!.
Urn'dom gahl, mahr. Minhas feridas fecham!.
Suas vidas não importam para mim!
Eles estão em todo o lugar!
Só fomos tão longe por causa minha!
Por que eu estou viajando com esses idiotas?
Então isto é o que o medo se parece...
Eu sei o que está tentando fazer.
Venha! Eu sei que está ai!
Vocês todos não são nada pra mim!
Eu sou a razão de ainda estarmos vivos!
Você vai me dar seu sangue!
Eu não irei falar com você.
Eu não posso ficar parado aqui.
Por que eu continuo tentando mesmo?
Nós deveriamos apenas deixar isso ir.
Perecer agora ou depois, não faz diferença.
Não me diga o que fazer!
Eu não posso fazer nada agora.
Por que eu devo me importar com isso?
Eu irei atacar quando eu quiser!
Eu irei fazer o que eu preciso!
Por que eu deveria ti escutar?
Eu vou ganhar isso da minha forma.
Eu faço o que eu quiser.
Eu irei fazer o que eu precisar.
Eu não quero perecer nesta masmorra.
Eu sinto maldade ao meu redor.
Não abaixe a guarda - estamos sendo observados.
Eu nunca quis viajar com nenhum de vocês.
Eu queria que fossem mais competentes.
Eu sou o lider desta expedição.
Se sobrevivermos, eu irei levar toda a glória!
nós deveriamos apenas nos cozinhar no fogo.
Eu só não nos vejos sobrevivendo a isto.
Eu comando VOCÊ, e não o contrário!
Faça-me sentir! me faça sentir vivo de novo!
Eu sei o que você quer fazer.
Eu não posso ir mais longe.
Pare de me dizer o que fazer!
Não, eles estão esperando para nos emboscar!
Nós não podemos escapar nosso fim.
Morrer é apenas uma parte de viver.
Estou enjoado e cansado de você.
Eu não posso me mover direito.
Eu acho que isso foi planejado.
Eles estão em todo o luygar.
Não é o que eu queria...
Eu deveria ter atacado mais cedo.
Por que você está no meu caminho?
Não! Por que você me atacou tão cedo?
Eu escuto eles atrás da gente.
Isso não é uma boa ideia.
Onde estão todos os inimigos se escondendo?
Nós não podemos ir por outro caminho.
Eu me recuso a confiar em você.
Isso não é ideal - eu preciso sofrer.
Eu não deveria fazer isto - eles estão antecipando.
Não, é apenas o que eles querem.

Sofrer é o caminho - se curar não é.
Não há razão para me curar.
Me curar não irá me ajudar.
Eu posso sobreviver sem a cura.
Não! Eu não irei me curar!
Eu faço as decisões por aqui.
Não. A dor é o caminho.
Isso não é uma ideia sabia.
Medo é uma emoção tão interessante.
A dor é um modo de vida.
Eu estou me coçando por uma luta.

Eu não posso mais aguentar isso.

Nós devemos apenas sair deste lugar.

Eu sou a meia noite da sua alma.
Tem algo de errado com essa comida...
Você está lutando por uma causa perdida.
Eu vou comer quando eu sentir vontade.
